results.title: Acute Myocarditis Following Vaccination With the First Dose of the mRNA-1273 Vaccine
results.journal: J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep
results.text_hl: Cardiac magnetic resonance scan was aborted after 2 attempts due to severe claustrophobia. His @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ resolved following initiation of @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Acetaminophen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000082 @@@tylenol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Colchicine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003078 @@@colchicine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Olagunju A, Moradi A, Johnson B, Lebaron Z, Johnson R, Mehdizadeh A. Acute Myocarditis Following Vaccination With the First Dose of the mRNA-1273 Vaccine J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep. 2022 Jan-Dec;10():23247096221092291. PMID: 35466745
citations.BibTeX: @article{35466745, title={Acute Myocarditis Following Vaccination With the First Dose of the mRNA-1273 Vaccine}, author={Olagunju A and Moradi A and Johnson B and Lebaron Z and Johnson R and Mehdizadeh A}, journal={J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep}, volume={10}, pages={23247096221092291}}

results.title: Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief
results.text_hl: After developing symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@, intermittent @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, and widespread @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ when he would think of his children in the weeks following their loss, he was prescribed @CHEMICAL_Gabapentin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077206 @@@gabapentin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ by a general practice nurse.

citations.NLM: Robinson KE. Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief Case Rep Psychiatry. 2021;2021():6661943. PMID: 33936830
citations.BibTeX: @article{33936830, title={Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief}, author={Robinson KE}, journal={Case Rep Psychiatry}, volume={2021}, pages={6661943}}

results.title: Type I Spontaneous Coronary Artery Dissection in a 33-Year-Old Male With Clinically Suspected Myopericarditis
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ did return four days later with recurring @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ with troponin levels of 409 ng/L at the time (Table 1) and was discharged without further workup.

citations.NLM: Nisson C, Hernandez Mato Y, Lingappa N, Abraham J. Type I Spontaneous Coronary Artery Dissection in a 33-Year-Old Male With Clinically Suspected Myopericarditis Cureus. 2023 May;15(5):e38570. PMID: 37288237
citations.BibTeX: @article{37288237, title={Type I Spontaneous Coronary Artery Dissection in a 33-Year-Old Male With Clinically Suspected Myopericarditis}, author={Nisson C and Hernandez Mato Y and Lingappa N and Abraham J}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={5}, pages={e38570}}

results.title: Chest pain associated with rate-related left bundle branch block and cardiac memory mimicking ischemia.
results.text_hl: CASE: A 33-year-old @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ female evaluated for @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Bundle_Branch_Block @DISEASE_MESH:D002037 @@@LBBB@@@ by ECG was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, and scheduled for stress testing.

citations.NLM: Malozzi C, Wenzel G, Karumbaiah K, Courtney M, Omar B. Chest pain associated with rate-related left bundle branch block and cardiac memory mimicking ischemia. J Cardiol Cases. 2014 Mar;9(3):87-90. PMID: 30534304
citations.BibTeX: @article{30534304, title={Chest pain associated with rate-related left bundle branch block and cardiac memory mimicking ischemia.}, author={Malozzi C and Wenzel G and Karumbaiah K and Courtney M and Omar B}, journal={J Cardiol Cases}, volume={9}, number={3}, pages={87-90}}

results.title: Comparative efficacy of lisinopril and nifedipine retard in essential hypertension: a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ there were single reports of @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, @DISEASE_Ankle_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D016512 @@@ankle swelling@@@, tiredness, and @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Richardson PJ, Meany TB, Johnston GD, Kondowe G, Grimmer SF, Breckenridge AM. Comparative efficacy of lisinopril and nifedipine retard in essential hypertension: a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1987;10 Suppl 10():S96-8. PMID: 2455154
citations.BibTeX: @article{2455154, title={Comparative efficacy of lisinopril and nifedipine retard in essential hypertension: a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.}, author={Richardson PJ and Meany TB and Johnston GD and Kondowe G and Grimmer SF and Breckenridge AM}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={10 Suppl 10}, pages={S96-8}}

results.title: Angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibition in heart failure or after myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: In several large trials, the administration of @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ within the first 36 hours after the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ due to MI was associated with significant reductions in mortality risk, compared with placebo.

citations.NLM: White CM. Angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibition in heart failure or after myocardial infarction. Am J Health Syst Pharm. 2000 Oct 1;57 Suppl 1():S18-25. PMID: 11030019
citations.BibTeX: @article{11030019, title={Angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibition in heart failure or after myocardial infarction.}, author={White CM}, journal={Am J Health Syst Pharm}, volume={57 Suppl 1}, pages={S18-25}}

results.title: Recurrent left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome in a patient with pheochromocytoma.
results.text_hl: A similar episode of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ occurred 4 years ago with same angiographic findings and reversible @DISEASE_Fetal_akinesia_syndrome_X_linked @DISEASE_MESH:C537921 @@@inferobasal akinesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Celebi H, Erdim R, Karabay KO, Yildirimturk O, Aytekin V. Recurrent left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome in a patient with pheochromocytoma. Int J Angiol. 2012 Mar;21(1):63-8. PMID: 23449065
citations.BibTeX: @article{23449065, title={Recurrent left ventricular apical ballooning syndrome in a patient with pheochromocytoma.}, author={Celebi H and Erdim R and Karabay KO and Yildirimturk O and Aytekin V}, journal={Int J Angiol}, volume={21}, number={1}, pages={63-8}}

results.title: [Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors during acute phase of myocardial infarct].
results.text_hl: There seems to be no intelligible reason, up to now, to deem that any ACE inhibitor should be considered better than another one in the acute phase of @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@, but still during the first 72 hours after the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Chest_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ the advantages have been shown only with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Mazzotta G, Vecchio C. [Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors during acute phase of myocardial infarct]. G Ital Cardiol. 1994 Jan;24(1):59-70. PMID: 8200499
citations.BibTeX: @article{8200499, title={[Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors during acute phase of myocardial infarct].}, author={Mazzotta G and Vecchio C}, journal={G Ital Cardiol}, volume={24}, number={1}, pages={59-70}}
